name: Worlds Builder Demo
detailed_description:
You are a legendary world builder, and the mysterious power of ancient alchemy is in your hands. Being the god and master of the new world, you will use forces of nature to separate the land from the seas and spark evolution.

Create new lands, mountains and forests, build houses, farms and workshops, discover new technologies. Start with a small mining village with a couple of mines and a sawmill. Grow it into a rich city surrounded by dense forests, golden wheat fields, and deep blue rivers.

Invite and train settlers who will work for you and grow your economy. Equip merchant ships and caravans to sell goods for sparkling gold. Brave explorers await your orders, ready to travel in search of rare treasures.

Everyone will find something of their own in WORLDS Builder—a game about alchemy, controlling forces of nature, creating worlds, building and researching! Create your dream world without limits!

• Open sandbox world can be changed with no limits in god mode
• Dozens of alchemical reactions to create new landscape elements and minerals
• Construction and progression of buildings: from huts to stone palaces, from primitive workshops to real factories
• Economic strategy: production planning, search for resources, new technologies
• Travel by land, water, and air
• Training settlers unlocks unique skills and turns weak peasants into real experts

© WORLDS Builder: Farm & Craft from creators of Doodle GOD, Doodle Devil and Doodle Mafia.

name: Wake World
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Wake World is a Multiplayer Coop, Open World RPG that takes place hundreds of years after a mysterious calamity, flooding the entire world leaving only islands in it's "wake"!

Adventure awaits you!

Explore the new world alone or with your friends, Wake World is all about discovery where you can Sail, Fight, Cook, Glide, Farm, Help villagers and so much more. Hop between islands where you will find everything from villagers to stinky radioactive spiders. Find the six artifacts which will put a stop to the endless onslaught on humanity or don't! That's right you are free to do what ever you want in this world, you could even become a pirate if you want! Maybe become a master cook? Or maybe you just want to buy as many horses and pets as your ship can hold :) The Karma spell system allows the people of Wake World to control elements of their choice whether it's Fire, Water, Earth, Lightning, Wind or Malice one can always become more powerful...

Your Ship Is Your Home

The main method of getting between islands is going to be your Steamship. You can even let go of the steer while you man the cannons or repair but of course it would be best to have your mates do it while you keep the ship on course. Customize your ship! Replace the old cannon's with shiny new blasters or replace rotten wood hull with gold plating, but the outside is not the only thing you can customize, Change the wallpaper or buy that super expensive king sized bed. Fully customize your character with very detailed level's of adjustments, so you can look how you want!

The Quest in Question

Shipwrecked, the traveler is taken in by the village, constantly under attack by the monsters a rumor is that it can be stopped but only someone sensitive to Karma spells is fit to venture out to the world on a quest to collect the six artifacts. There are no classes and no fixed paths, collect the artifacts in whatever order, that is if you want to save the villagers...The ocean is filled with mutated monsters and humans, treasure, old world remnants and many islands that have yet to be touched by human hands. Fully playable from start to end with your crew of choice.

Discover new islands, master spells, craft a new rifle or help out the villagers of Wake World in this Multiplayer, Open World, Action RPG.

name: Lo-Fi: THEXNERXXM
detailed_description:
이 게임은 1맵1치킨 알만툴 대회 참가작입니다.



1맵1치킨 알만툴 대회는 RPG Maker 제작자 모임 디스코드 서버에서 주최하는 대회입니다.

RPG Maker(알만툴/쯔꾸르)를 활용해 단 하나의 맵(map)만이 사용된 게임을 만드는 대회로, 맵을 하나만 사용해야 한다는 제한 속에서 어떤 아이디어들이 창발될 수 있을지를 탐구해봅니다.

출품작 중 우수작품을 선정하여 치킨과 상금을 선물해 드리고 있습니다.

https://1map1chicken.com/ 을 방문하여 역대 참가작과 수상작들을 확인해보세요.


Lo-Fi란?



Lo-Fi 시리즈는 개발자인 aped가 "만들고 싶은 대로 만드는" 약간 실험적인 단편 게임 모음으로, 시리즈 간의 연관성은 있을랑말랑합니다.

THEXNERXXM은 FLY, ㅅㅂ에 이은 Lo-Fi 시리즈의 세 번째 습작입니다.


About the Game

도움을 부탁드립니다

안녕하세요, 저는 당신과는 다른 세계의 트라우마 치료 센터에 근무하는 오퍼레이터 명이에요.

이렇게 편지를 남기게 된 이유는, 조금 갑작스럽지만 당신께 이번 작업을 함께 해주십사 부탁하기 위해서입니다. 작업은 의뢰인의 기억의 방에서 이루어지며, 구성원은 당신과 저, 그리고 실제 기억의 방에서 장비를 설치하고 치료를 수행할 현장 다이버 한 명 이렇게 3인으로 이루어져 있습니다. 다이버와 함께 치료 작업을 수행해 주세요. 저도 통신으로 여러분들을 지원하겠습니다.

혹시 마음이 동하신다면 실행 파일을 통해 의뢰인의 기억의 방으로 진입해 주세요.

아래는 작업 수행에 도움이 되는 세부사항들이에요.

- 아래 -
  • 당신은 다이버에게 직접적인 오더를 내리게 될 것입니다. 소통 매뉴얼은 다음과 같습니다.
    • 방향키: 이동
    • Z/Spacebar/Enter: 상호작용
    • X/ESC: 취소
    • Shift: 대사 스킵
    • F5: 전체 화면/창 모드 전환
    • F6: 창 크기 변경
  • 저와 연결할 수 있는 무전기를 동봉합니다. 이 무전기는 다이버에게도 지급되며, 다이버에게 자세한 사용법을 안내받을 수 있을 것입니다.

short_description: 당신과는 다른 세계의 트라우마 치료 센터에서 진행되는 이야기. "작업"은 의뢰인의 '기억의 방'에서 이루어지며, 구성원은 당신과 오퍼레이터, 그리고 기억의 방에서 직접 장비를 설치하고 치료를 수행할 현장 요원 '다이버' 한 명, 총 3인입니다. 다이버와 함께 치료 작업을 수행해 주세요.

name: NEXT DOOR - An Eternal World
detailed_description:
The girl who lost her memory wandered into a truly strange world.
Animals wore clothes, walked on two legs, and talked with humans as a matter of course.

The scientist who summoned her named Eva, had a specific purpose in mind.
An anti-human movement on the rise brought Eva last hope, the legend of the "outsider".

In the strange world inhabited by a wide variety of peoples who believe in various forms of the one and only God, the wheels of fate begin to spin around the girl who is from another world.

-Genres

Full-length RPG, Fantasy, Isekai

-Estimated time to clear

About 15 hours and more(Two Endings)

name: Cat Nips
detailed_description:
In this reverse horror game you inflict the terror! You've broken out of your containment cell. Now is the perfect time to unleash chaos. It'll take skill to escape alive. There are potential dangers around every corner as you explore what remains of an office. There are signs that someone went here before, a bloody someone.

Features:

  • Eat your enemies - Office workers may not all be part of this scheme, but is mercy more important than a snack ? Use your sharp teeth to eat almost anything you run into !


  • Inflitration & Stealth - Cut your way through an office filled with guards, cameras and other dangers ! Use stealth to avoid detection of the nearby guards or eat them. Your life depends on it...


  • Discover the truth - Will you uncover the mysteries of your presence in this place ? Find out what happened and who is responsible for capturing you and giving you this fairly well-developed dentition.

  • Avoid the bigger fish - The unspeakable experiments performed on you made you strong, but you weren't the only test subject. In fact the other may be closer than you think, do not get caught by them or else you will pay the price...

Why would you eat a desk ?

Features:

  • Eat your enemies - Office workers may not all be part of this scheme, but is mercy more important than a snack ? Use your sharp teeth to eat almost anything you run into !


  • Inflitration & Stealth - Cut your way through an office filled with guards, cameras and other dangers ! Use stealth to avoid detection of the nearby guards or eat them. Your life depends on it...


  • Discover the truth - Will you uncover the mysteries of your presence in this place ? Find out what happened and who is responsible for capturing you and giving you this fairly well-developed dentition.

  • Avoid the bigger fish - The unspeakable experiments performed on you made you strong, but you weren't the only test subject. In fact the other may be closer than you think, do not get caught by them or else you will pay the price...

Why would you eat a desk ?
short_description: Cat Nips is a game about a cat eating people to escape an office. This cat will need to sneak past guards, cameras and other dangers in order to escape.

name: ConflictCraft 2 - Game of the Year Edition
detailed_description:
ConflictCraft 2 is the sequel to https://store.steampowered.com/app/495570/ConflictCraft/ which became surprisingly popular and beloved by nearly 200K players on Steam! For this reason alone we've decided to release a brand new title that's far more compelling and in-depth from a tactical point of view.

It's a strategy game where your goal is to assume direct control over enemy bases shortly before destroying them from the inside. You'll need proper management of your resources, but also leadership skills in order to fully control the opposing forces. Keeping your own bases out of harm's way is paramount. You will be able to diverge half of your available troops for offensive tasks, while the rest must remain staunch defenders. Finding a balance is the key to victory, of course.

Helping you annihilate your foes, you'll have a full arsenal consisting of tanks, helicopters, F-15 Eagle jet fighters and even rocket launchers similar to North Korean designs! After each level you can upgrade your forces as you see fit.

Game Features:
- 53 challenging levels to complete.
- Level Editor allowing complex map customization.
- Large selection of competing nations & factions.
- 32 steam achievements

name: Fairy Deer
detailed_description:
There's nothing but pitch-black darkness, thick fog and rows of trees here. Not a single ray of light reaches the depths of the Forest, where many monsters lurk. People inhabiting this place are in a constant fight for survival. Some try to escape the Forest's clutches, but its reach is infinite, it refuses to let go of its victims.

The sole hope left in this world for Misha and his family is a mythical Fairy Deer. It wanders the heart of the Forest, far away from villages, ready to give anyone who catches it a ride to the Beautiful Tomorrow. Yet, something still weighs on the hunters' minds: will they be able to retain their humanity in this desperate chase after true happiness?

Features


  • Oppressive atmosphere of the Dark Forest
  • Unique art style that will immerse you in the game's world
  • A breathtaking story with unexpected plot twists
  • Original soundtrack by Flue

name: The Battle Never Ends
detailed_description:
이 게임은 1치킨 게임잼 참가작입니다.



1치킨 게임잼은 RPG Maker 제작자 모임 디스코드 서버에서 주최하는 1맵1치킨 알만툴 대회의 하위 대회입니다. 단 하나의 맵(map)만을 사용하는 본대회와는 달리, 1치킨 게임잼에서는 오로지 키워드의 제약만 두고 자유롭게 게임을 만듭니다.

출품작 중 우수작품을 선정하여 치킨을 선물해 드렸습니다.

https://1map1chicken.com/ 을 방문하여 참가작과 수상작들을 확인해보세요.


About the Game

싸움은 끝나지 않는다는 약간의 호러 요소가 가미된 어드벤처 게임입니다. 기존의 턴제 RPG 전투의 틀에서 벗어나 주변을 조사하고, 전투 공간과 상호작용하세요.

이 게임에서 당신은 적을 물리쳤지만, 전투에서 빠져나오지 못하는 상황을 마주하게 됩니다. 미지의 전투 공간 안에서 용사 일행의 시점으로 주변을 조사하고 단서를 찾으며 나아가, 전투가 끝나지 않는 원인을 알아내세요. 싸움을 끝내기 위해서는 기존과는 다른 시각으로 턴제 전투 공간을 바라보며 싸워야 할 것입니다.

시놉시스

마왕과의 마지막 싸움에서 용사 랄프 일행은 마왕을 무찔렀지만 전투 상태에서 빠져나오지 못하게 된다. 전투 공간과 현실 간의 위화감을 느끼게 된 랄프 일행은 기존에는 수행할 수 없었던 행동들을 하게 되면서 미지의 공간을 탐험한다. 전투 공간의 깊이를 알게 될수록 랄프 일행은 진실에 조금씩 가까워지게 되는데...

name: Ghost
detailed_description:
Ghost is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of horror and scares you in every way. The gameplay consists of collecting notes and videotapes, solving riddles and escaping ghosts, as well as other mechanics inherent in any horror game. The main goal is to survive and be saved.

Brief background:


Ghosts live everywhere, in our cities and villages. These mysterious creatures walk and fly through us, and what's more scary, they can physically affect us, or even kill us!

So, the hero of this game was "lucky" to meet these unusual creatures and not only meet, but also feel in his own skin all that ghosts can be!

The main character, an ordinary unremarkable guy named Klim, ended up in a rather strange abandoned place. From the very beginning, the place that Klim got into begins to catch up with negative emotions, and the more the main characters are in a strange building, the more they become convinced that he is not alone there.



You have to overcome your fear, going through gloomy locations for the main character, solving various puzzles along the way and trying to understand what is happening, how you got here, and most importantly, how to get out of this place.

name: Albert Wilde: Quantum P.I. Demo
detailed_description:
The name’s Albert… Albert Wilde. I’m the cat you come to when you need some justice in this town.

This is an early access demo! Improvements &
additions will be following this version.
Waiting for your feedback: https://beyondthosehills.com/discord


Move around 1930 in a fictional NY with your car (gameplay footage).

Albert Wilde is down on his luck. He’s broke, he’s friendless, he can’t get a girl, and his landlord won’t let him pee on the office wall anymore. When a pole-dancing flamingo stumbles upon a dead body in an abandoned warehouse, Albert decides that solving the case will also solve all his other problems. If only life were so simple...

Featuring:
  • A bold blend of film noir, sci-fi, and crude animal humour!
  • Innovative black and white graphics! 4:3 aspect ratio!
  • Cunning villains! Ravishing dames!
  • Loveable deadbeat hero on the road to redemption!
  • Solve a mystery perhaps!
  • An easy to play accessible adventure
  • Captivating narration voice-over & peculiar handcrafted animal sounds.

Gameplay:
  • First person controller from a cat's perspective.
  • Walk, run freely in several 3D scenes.
  • Dynamic conversation system with NPCs.
  • Interrogate suspects.
  • Spend around 4-5 hours on a bizarre narrative game.


First person controller from a cat's perspective (gameplay footage).

name: Miuma
detailed_description:
Do you remember your aunt fifteen years ago, fussing in the kitchen in the early morning to prepare pastry for first customers? But now your old house was abandoned and the glory of the former bakery is lost. Could you accept the challenge and after so many years return home and revive the family business?

In this game you can provide neighbors with tasty cakes, pies and rolls, do different handicrafts, take part in the town’s fest and fairs, listen to sounds of nature, contemplate old town’s streets, meet with people around you and explore together with Kevin!

This game has both various gameplay and a captivating plot. It tells a story of an old town through its vivid residents, including Kevin and his ancestors. It gives you a choice and freedom, but responsibility for further consequences too. It allows you to decide for yourself what are you going to do today and shows you that often we don’t see opportunities that are in front of us.

Sometimes people face barriers which they can’t cope with. Sometimes people make terrible mistakes and wrong decisions. Sometimes world turns out not as open as you thought in childhood. But even so, you need to keep your heart warm and let the love in when it comes to live life to the fullest.

This game is not a simple bakery simulator, it’s a story about a young man, whose fate was to resume family traditions of baking and who can reject it, but does he want to?

Your life is picked together by your habits.

name: Food Empire
detailed_description:
CHECK MORE GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1868210/Bunker_Builder_Simulator/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826460/Shopping_Mall_Renovator/



Food Empire is an economic strategy game in which you will be able to build your own restaurant business. You will begin with one small diner in a location of your choosing, and in time you will be able to expand to different areas. The game lets you take control of many aspects of managing restaurants, and allows for some personal customization of your brand's look.

It goes like this:

First you choose a building to buy, while considering various different factors.



Not its time to renovate. Sell all the junk you find and choose the look of walls and floors.



Design the restaurant yourself. In time you will be able to unlock many additional interior items.



Pick your staff according to their skill level and payment expectations.



Finally - feed your customers!



In time new opportunities will open up and allow for branching out into different food businesses. Manage your finances, take care of your customer's needs and slowly but surely you will build your Food Empire.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic Demo
detailed_description:
When a power hungry, egotistical witch spreads her dark magic across the land, it is up to one raccoon to stop her! Play as Roxy, an adventurous young cub as she rolls through four unique worlds in order to end the witch’s dastardly plans!

Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic is a retelling of the original platformer, this told through an energetic and unique pinball format. End the witch’s wicked curse and conquer her many challenges. Prove, once and for all, that you are the true pinball champion!


8 Pinball Tables with 4 Unique Themes inspired by tables from the 80s to the modern era!

Online Achievements and Leaderboards will showcase your pinball prowess to the world!

Unique Story Mode allows you to relive iconic moments from Roxy Raccoon in a reimagined pinball environment!

Experience classic Pinball action in Arcade Mode with optional "Roxy-Assist" which allows you to manipulate her rolls!

Roll in style as you unlock colorful new cosmetics to customize Roxy’s appearance.

name: Panicked and Surrounded by Hot Vampires
detailed_description:
In the harsh season of Winter, 47-year-old Chester H. Smith was sent out to survey a property that wasn't on the registry. When he goes to inspect the house, he finds that the two owners, Dez and Viscardi, are vampires! He finds himself trapped with these strangers until the winter storm passes over. Will Chester make it out alive? Will sparks fly between him and one of the vampiric homeowners?

Panicked and Surrounded by Hot Vampires is a comedy, romance game that talks about life and death featuring eternal characters and a character who is running out of time.

Content Warning: This game contains strong language, blood, death, and grieving over deceased family members. Please be advised while playing.


  • Partial voice acting
  • Over 20k words
  • Two romance options
  • Five endings (2 bad, 3 good/romance endings, including a polyamorous ending!)
  • The default text option is Dyslexic-friendly

name: Zero Orders Tactics
detailed_description:
Turn-based puzzle strategy, where you can't give any orders. Your unit will choose their path and targets by themselves.
What you do every turn is changing your troops types and terrain tiles. Then press "End turn" and see your plan is being executed
With a little help of magic, it should be enough to protect your convoy through a series of puzzle battles and fight a boss in the end.

Rouge-lite: Upgrade your army, find new spells and recombine your build before every mission, but your enemy will also prepare more and more surprises.

How long (an answer for busy players, like myself): 3-4 hours for a successful run with certain replayability to start another with another build.

name: Cool Kid Cody
detailed_description:
Episode 1: Cool Kid Cody's Day On!
It’s God Recruitment Day and Cody’s late for class! He’d better jet if he’s gonna impress Crescent High’s almighty God!

~~~

In a world of Losers, Cool Kids and Gods, where Losers wish they were Cool Kids, Cool Kids wish they were Gods and Gods rule over all, Cool Kid Cody embarks on his quest for Godhood! All he's gotta do is achieve the impossible: transform the biggest Loser in school into a Cool Kid. Should he fail, he might just lose his cool.

Cool Kid Cody is an interactive point & click cartoon series!

Key Features

  • Interact with the world using point & click mechanics!
  • Collect items, make choices and explore in order to progress the story!
  • Find bonus photos scattered across each episode!
  • Keep your skateboard powered up by making the coolest choice for the coolest scenes!

Episode 1 is free to play with the rest of Season 1's episodes being released as DLC. Episodes are released every Friday starting April 8th - June 10th. Stay tuned!

name: Jumping Knight
detailed_description:
Jumping Knight is a platform game in which your task is to get to the top. However easy it seems, it is very, very difficult ... By reaching the top you will test your patience and determination. Remember that there is a lesson in each fall...

In your way to the top you will encounter many obstacles such as..

  • Locked doors that need to be opened with keys...



  • Rotating planets...



  • Moving platforms...


..and many other scary moments on your way to the top. It is one of the most skill-testing games in the world. Only a few manage to dominate the entire game.

Gameplay:

  • Arcade, retro style, enhancing reflexes and patience
  • Every jump counts
  • Don't distract yourself or you will fall
  • Easy to play hard to master
  • Your every step is saved

name: Life after Death
detailed_description:
Life after Death - is a psychological first-person thriller.

WARNING: This video game may cause an attack of photosensitive epilepsy to people suffering this disease. A reasonable restriction of the gaming audience is recommended.

IMPORTANT NOTE: The main emphasis of the game is on the process of exploration, as the tension slowly builds up, creating an even more complete and vivid effect of presence.

ABOUT THIS GAME:

You have a chance to return to the period of childhood and live a period of life of the main character, Jessy. One day you will find yourself in an incomprehensible and unknown place, understanding that something is wrong with you and you do not remember anything. As you progress, you will remember the bright moments of your life, overcome the phobias that accompanied you, solve puzzles, and also understand why you ended up here and what happened to you. You need to help Jessy recreate the events that happened earlier, get to know his family and experience everything that he did.



-Genre "Walking Simulator";
- You need to read the notes very careful;
-You shall Attentively research locations and pay attention to details and surroundings.

DESCRIPTION OF CONTENT FOR ADULTS
The developer describes the content like this:
The game contains realistic images of scenes of violence that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Some content items may not be suitable for certain age groups.

name: Escape Purgatory
detailed_description:
Set in a limbo realm, this strategic horror game, which has the choice of first-person or third-person charges the player with traversing the world while solving puzzles and challenges. With each discovery, collect items, repent your sins, and be freed from evil. Can you survive the wickedness within?

Story mode: You find yourself in a strange dark place with no one around to help. You solve different puzzles and present your findings to repent your sins and become free from evil.

Survival mode: How long can you last? With nonstop demons coming from all angles and no light at the end of the tunnel. Can you keep your inner light glowing?

name: 破廉恥な女戦士アテナ (中文無碼版)
detailed_description:
破廉恥な女戦士アテナ (中譯: 恥力女戰士)

【玩法】
經典的回合制JRPG融入濃厚的H元素! 操作主角探索世界, 打怪升級。隨著故事推進可得到更多角色加入, 一同做色色的事以變得更強! 努力為村子打倒敵人, 解放村子吧!

【遊戲系統】
・女主角雅典娜獨有的恥力屬性!每當經歷H事件,雅典娜不知羞恥的程度便會相應增加。在歷盡各種破廉恥事件,恥力女戰士最終能否戰勝最終BOSS所帶來的屈辱?

・敵人除了以力量或魔法作出攻擊,還會對眾女角使出各種下流招數,包括胸襲、撩陰及強行插入等。面對這等下流招數,以恥力女戰士為首的性感戰團又會如何招架?

・在戰鬥中不小心中毒可就糟了,每回合都會扣HP,這可嚴重影響戰鬥啊!可是買不起昂貴的解毒草該怎麼辦?聽說積聚的毒素可經小穴排出體外,中毒後只要立即高潮,噴射出來的淫水就可以把毒素沖出來。可是,人家正在戰鬥呢,究竟怎樣才能快速的達至高潮?

・「我是未被沾污的處女,聖靈充滿著我的身體,因此經我純潔小穴流出的愛液也得到神的祝福」。喝了純潔祭司的「聖水」能大幅增加戰鬥力,這可是十分珍貴的資源!你會趁我們神聖的西布莉不再純潔之前盡情的搾乾她嗎?

・精美HCG多達24幅,差分數目更加達至140幅以上!切入圖9種,差分34張!立繪亦有各種表情及傷害變化。艷麗的畫風和令人意想不到的劇情,誠意帶你進入奇幻RPG獨有的色慾世界。

【故事概要】
位於王國大陸邊緣的小村,那裡的婦女經常遭到半獸人的侵犯。它會毫不留情的殺掉男性人類,而對女性只會強姦凌辱,絕不會殺掉。

村子的新生代戰士,在他們能夠獨當一面之前,很快就會被半獸人殺掉,因此村裡根本沒有能抵抗半獸人的戰士!

一名苟存的戰士靈機一觸:既然半獸人不殺女生,那麼只要找到擁有戰士資質的女生,加以訓練,那麼遲早有一天,她定必能夠打敗半獸人,只要她捱得過之前不斷的被性侵犯…

此天選之女必需擁有強健的身體和淫蕩的心靈才可抵受半獸人的凌辱。要成為能夠拯救村子於恥辱的女戰士,她必需先捨棄自己的羞恥心!

於是,戰士決定對自己的女兒進行嚴格的戰鬥和色情訓練。恥力女戰士破廉恥登場!!

【角色介紹】
雅典娜
職業:女戰士
本作的女主角,性格樂觀開朗,富有正義感,卻為了對抗半獸人,被父親調教為沒有羞恥心的女戰士,身體與精神也得到了很好的開發。

西布莉
職業:女祭司
女主角的好朋友,經常幫助女主角。村鎮被半獸人入侵後,犧牲自己,一人服侍多個半獸人,使教堂的避難者免受強姦的命運。

芙雷亞
職業:女飛賊
外表為清純的可愛少女,為人卻貪財,偷呃拐騙,無所不幹。被女主角所救後,視其為伙伴,甘願與她一起對抗半獸人。

露剎卡
職業:女魔法師
原為孤兒,在她遭遇危險時被阿斯莫德所救。因為樣貌跟莉莉絲相似,因此阿斯莫德收了她做魔法學徒。
仰慕阿斯莫德,對他言聽計從,其他一切則漠不關心。

name: 戛然而止的音符
detailed_description:
●故事(STORY)●
这是一个有关于恋爱的故事。
我有一个喜欢的女孩子。
她是我的青梅竹马。
原本打算认认真真的向她表白。
可是有一天她却红着脸跟我说——
——她有喜欢的人了。
我以为这里故事就应该结束了。
直到我得知她喜欢的人，竟然是我的亲姐姐？

●特点(FEATURES)●
※荒诞无厘头
※游戏角色冇得配音
※数十张CG
※高水准演出。
※纯爱值比较高

name: Northgard - Dodsvagr, Clan of the Rat
detailed_description:
Welcoming in wounded and outcast villagers who have been forced out of their original clans without hesitation or prejudice, it is understandable why the many followers of the Rat dedicate their life, and sometimes their death, to the clan.

The clan doesn’t have time for feasts, or even sleeping in houses, only hard work is worth celebrating, but if you have enough energy to celebrate, then you could, and should have worked harder…

The clan will work and fight tirelessly to get what they want, and to survive.






Powerful shaman and merciless warrior, Eir leads the clan of the rat with an iron fist. She taught the ways of the shamans to her clan, so they could survive even the most severe of injuries, and ensure their enemies did not.

Some even say that her mastering of dark practices go so far as to bring back dead beasts from the depths of Helheim...






With the training of Eir, the clan can train shamans, powerful units that will fight fearlessly during the heat of battle, and take care of the injured in its aftermath. They can also lend a helpful hand to their allies by healing them as well.




  • The clan has more villagers but they arrive wounded. Wounded units do not count for Happiness requirements.
  • The clan doesn't have access to Houses, but all non-mystic buildings provide housing. Once max population is reached, extra villagers stack in a Population Reserve.
  • The Shaman Camp replaces the Healer Hut and trains Shamans able to fight and heal multiple units and allies even outside your territory.
  • When the clan units kill foes or die, the corpses are cremated at the Shaman Camp, producing Lore and attracting new villagers faster.
  • Overwork replaces the Feast and boosts all productions at the expense of your worker's health.




  • Fame 200
    When healed by Eir, your units consume -50% less Food.

  • Fame 500
    Population Reserve can hold +4 villagers max. The maximum duration of Purification Pyre is extended to 6 months.




  • Enrollment
    Your wounded units cost -50% Kröwns to train as military units.

  • Overcrowding
    You can place up to two buildings of the same type in a zone, except Defense Towers.

  • Invasion
    When killing neutral faction units, you gain some of their favorite tradable resources. Neutral faction buildings can house additional population.

  • Pain Suppressant
    Wounded units move and attack 30% faster.

  • Blood Ties
    Eir can sacrifice part of her health to heal all your units in the zone over the next 5 seconds.






You can summon Garm’s Incarnation at a Shaman Camp.

name: Retro Kart Rush
detailed_description:
Retro Kart Rush:


Retro Kart Rush is a retro racing game that will transport you back to the 16-bit era. Where friendships were made (or broken) by playing multiplayer games in front of the TV.

Featuring pixelated characters, arcade physics, and gameplay that is both easy to learn and deep enough to satisfy veterans of the genre.

Features:


- Cup, single-race, and time trials modes.
- Single-player or multiplayer split-screen with 2, 3, or 4 players!
- 4 different difficulty settings to suit all levels of players.
- 8 different cups with 18 unique tracks
- 9 characters with different attributes

name: Hearts of Iron IV - Expansion Subscription
detailed_description:
In order to enjoy the content included in the Expansion Subscription you will need to own the Hearts of Iron IV base game.


If you are missing some or all of the Hearts of Iron IV expansions or other additional content for the game, this subscription plan makes all of that available for you so you can experience the titanic struggle of 20th century ideologies to its fullest extent.

Hearts of Iron IV, Paradox Interactive’s grand strategy wargame. Command the mightiest war machines in history, rewriting the events of World War II as the fires of conflict swirl around you. With this subscription, you will have access to all seven expansion and country packs, three unit skin packs, and three audio packs to complete your collection.

This subscription plan includes:

  • Together for Victory:

    This expansion to Hearts of Iron IV introduces unique historical paths and events for the major British Dominions - Canada, Australia, New Zealand and South Africa - and the Indian Raj, as well as a new autonomy system to manage subject states.

  • Death or Dishonor:

    This country pack add-on to Hearts of Iron IV has unique historical paths and events, including dramatic alternate histories, for the East European middle powers - Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Romania and Yugoslavia.

  • Waking the Tiger:

    The war in Asia takes center stage with new National Focus trees for the Chinese factions and Japan, as well as an expanded German tree. The Chain of Command system allows for more complex military organization, and the trait system for generals has been completely revised.

  • Man the Guns:

    The new naval themed expansion lets you design your own ships and refit older models. Alter your convoy routes to avoid hungry wolf packs. Embrace or circumvent naval treaties and deal with the diplomatic consequences.

  • Battle for the Bosporus:

    This country pack includes new paths and events for nations of the Eastern Mediterranean, including Bulgaria, Greece and Turkey.

  • La Résistance:

    Introduces espionage and code breaking to the game, with multiple ways to subvert or learn your enemies’s plans. Also new occupation and resistance systems.

  • No Step Back:

    Major Eastern Front expansion has new features for the Soviet Union, Poland and the Baltic States, as well as a tank designer and major changes to Army Command and the supply and logistics system.

  • Radio Pack:

    35 songs spread across all three factions, as well reproduced music from earlier games in the Hearts of Iron series.

  • Axis Armor Pack:

    Over 60 armored vehicle models for the German, Japanese and Italian armies, including the StuG III, Japanese experimental heavy tanks and the L-6 light tank.

  • Allied Armor Pack:

    Over 50 armored vehicle models for the American, Soviet, British, and French armies, including the M7 Priest, the French Renault tank and a host of new tank destroyers.

  • Allied Speeches Pack:

    Over 70 minutes of speeches from some of the most inspiring moments from the Allied campaign, including MacArthur’s celebrated “I shall return” and Churchill’s pledge to “fight on the beaches”.

  • Eastern Front Planes Pack:

    Over 50 new airplane models for nations fighting in central and eastern Europe, including Germany, the Soviet Union, Poland, Romania, Yugoslavia and Hungary.

  • Eastern Front Music Pack:

    13 new music tracks including the Soviet National Anthem, Lili Marlene and My, Pierwsza Brygada.

  • Two Sabaton Music Packs:

    Songs from history themed metal band Sabaton.
about_the_game:

If you are missing some or all of the Hearts of Iron IV expansions or other additional content for the game, this subscription plan makes all of that available for you so you can experience the titanic struggle of 20th century ideologies to its fullest extent.

Hearts of Iron IV, Paradox Interactive’s grand strategy wargame. Command the mightiest war machines in history, rewriting the events of World War II as the fires of conflict swirl around you. With this subscription, you will have access to all seven expansion and country packs, three unit skin packs, and three audio packs to complete your collection.

name: Haunted Stories
detailed_description:
Haunted Stories is a captivating mix of horror and thriller.
Experience several exciting haunted stories, each telling its own independent storyline.
Each playable story contains its own secrets, game mechanics and puzzles to solve.
The lovingly crafted environments tell their own past and invite exploration and investigation. If you think you know what the real story is, be prepared for surprises and unpredictable twists!

Haunted Stories:

Supermarket:
Experience the point of view of a thief who wants to rob a supermarket. He quickly realizes that something is wrong. Strange apparitions cause him to start having doubts... will he get out in one piece?

Western Town:
During the time of the wild west, a traveler wanted to rest in a town and spend a night. Once there, he notices that it is now a ghost town.
Is there a reason for this?

Creepy Forest:
A person visits his hunter friend in his forest cabin. However, it seems to be abandoned.
As he has begun the search for his friend, more and more questions have arisen.
What happened to the hunter?

More stories to follow during the Early Access phase

Game Information:
There will be at least five standalone stories told until the final version, each containing multiple endings and many mysteries.

Each story has its own protagonist and is set in a different time.

Explore the open areas and look out for clues or traces to find out the true story.

The different locations and the different times of the events, also offer varied and exciting game mechanics.

Each story offers multiple endings. Which one will you experience and will it be the true ending?

Protect Bunnygirl from her foes


In You Are NOT Bunnygirl, you control a robot who wakes up deep underground. You must protect her from her malfunctioning siblings, the dangers of the Lab, and even her own emotions.

  • Explore an atmospheric world with a minimalistic color aesthetic
  • Synth-based soundtrack with lots of reverb
  • Emotionally scarred NPCs
  • The save point is a couch
  • The save point is also a lesbian
  • The save point will yell at you if you're bad at the game

name: Happy fruit
detailed_description:
Introduction to play

The game playing method is similar to the traditional Xiaole. When the fruits in horizontal or vertical columns are connected into more than 3, they can be eliminated. The biggest feature of the game is the clearance mechanism. You must eliminate the blocks in the specified area within the specified number of steps to pass.

featured part

When more than 3 fruits are eliminated at one time, a super elimination fruit of the same type can also be generated. When this super fruit is eliminated next time, it will have a special effect and cause an explosion in a larger area.
You can also accumulate points every time you pass the game level. Challenge the limit points you can accumulate! If you don't want to get points through the game, you can also buy through the in-game purchase system!

name: EVERING
detailed_description:
Evering is a turn-based RPG adventure game that tells an epic story through witty and funny dialogues with charismatic characters in a completely new and detailed world.

The first chapter, Journey of a Tale, lays the groundwork for the game, opens up conflicts and introduces experienced and novice players to a new world and a bunch of characters.






Evering is the story of Eldar, Prince of Onnya, who is obsessed with finding the origin of a legend. He has invested his life in it, often forgetting his royal duties.

The first chapter is just the beginning of an epic adventure that will lead Eldar and his companions to travel the world in search of answers, and probably to find something they didn't know they were looking for.




  • 5+ hours of gameplay
  • Traditional Turn-based ATB combat system
  • Great balance between drama and comedy
  • Character stats progression based on equipment
  • Explore to learn new habilites and spells
  • Fun side quests with valuable rewards
  • Secrets where you least expect them
  • Customizable controls, Controller/Keyboard/Mouse






Eldar is a naive prince raised in the palace, without much experience outside its walls and often doesn't understand certain social behaviors of the common people. Nevertheless, he is willing to do whatever it takes to fulfill what he has been obsessed with all his life, unveil the origin of the hero from the legend.

He is always accompanied by his faithful governess Lue, an elderly but powerful woman, tremendously skilled in the art of magic who will do whatever it takes to protect the life of her pupil. She's determined and confident, more than just a palace employee as she sees in Eldar the son she never had.

On their way they'll meet Jövla, a mysterious wanderer wearing armor who investigates certain forgotten ruins. Little else is known about this cryptic character who avoids the most compromising questions and often gets sidetracked.



Thank you for playing!

Disclaimer:


We have decided to release the game as early access, but the game is currently bug free and provides a good gameplay experience. The game will be updated with new chapters as we finish them.

The game currently has the first chapter of the three chapters that will complete the story. Please read carefully the Early Access section (above) to learn more about the status of the game an follow us on Twitter (@PurpureSt_) to keep up to date with the latest updates on the game development.

Purpure Studio is formed by only 2 people. Please keep this in mind.

name: Hand Cannon: Janky Reality
detailed_description:
In the not-so-distant future, aliens invade and take over the earth, and only 1 man can stop them, Jack Johnson. There is only 1 problem. He has been dead for years. With the power of (not so) modern earth technology and stolen alien technology, Jack's cryopreserved body is brought back to life by Dr. Ilao. However, Jack's body is still not quite ready to join the war effort. He must complete the good doctor's simulation before he can start killing aliens.

Take on the role of Jack Jackson and complete the simulation!

  • Defeat 10 Bosses
  • Complete 12 levels
  • Unlock 8 unique weapons
  • Metroidvania NG+
  • Create and share levels with friends and strangers (It is basically a Metroidvania maker if you have the patience.)
  • A killer soundtrack!
  • 1-bit graphics with a ton of unlockable pallets.
  • Inspired by our favorite Blue Bomber.
  • Easy mode for those that prefer to dash instead of recoil jumping.

name: Unearthed Stories: John's Tombstone Demo
detailed_description:
A Digital Eulogy


John's Tombstone is a narrative game with 3 chapters each one completely different from the other. You will be driving a car in a dream, walking around on the afterlife and talking with angels to unravel a story of acceptance, sci-fi and emotional strength. The chapters here within will resonate more if you've lost someone dear to you.

What does the demo include


  • Prologue and first chapter of the game
  • A walking simulator experience, lots of dialogues written with wit and love

Something different


This game is the digital eulogy to my dad, a man whose name was not John. Each chapter will tell you a bit of how people fight with grief while also leaking some small real-life details of a great man.

name: Stakeholder Game
detailed_description:
Investment business simulation game.
Become the richest billionaire ever!
Build your financial empire out of merged companies and increase your capital.

Buy shares in the most promising startups - earn dividends and create international holdings! Open new districts, pump up and grow your companies. Set up production, improve processes, invest in marketing and advertising. All of this will pay you even more dividends!

The game teaches you fundamental analysis and how to invest in shares. Events and news allows you to successfully trade shares. With all of the different real-world companies in the game you have a stable pattern of investing and receiving a passive dividend income.

Once you've completed the game you'll have a clear understanding of what's going on in the stock market and how to invest via the trader's banking apps.

The beautiful city, the bird's-eye view, the towering skyscrapers and the money you make will immerse you in the fascinating world of shares trading!

Silicon Valley for desktops and smartphones!
This game is a continuation of our most popular stock trading game for smartphones - Stock Exchange Game

name: Brick Cracker 3D
detailed_description:
Welcome gamer!

This is the first game to introduce the "Brick Breaker" genre to 3D!

BRICK CRACKER 3D

Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to kick these bricks and crack them! In this 3D place, there are 45 unique level challenges for you. Plus, there are 9 retro-style music tracks in the game. You can press "Esc" or "Q" button for the menu in the game.

Mission is simple; stay cool and crash these bricks!

Rules!

There's a rule you need to pay attention to; don't drop the ball! You only have 3 lives in each level. Each brick you break will give you as many points as your remaining lives. If you have 1 lives, you get 1 point, capish? :)

In each level, the game gives you 3 lives again. If you lose all your lives, the game over.

Thanks!

- To my family (my wife and my son) for their support and help.
- Jascha (@CreaPracticus /Twitter) and Anuman (@Anuman_mp3 /Twitter) for their musics and support.
- And I want to thank you. You are here and reviewing my first game. Maybe you will play, maybe you will pass, but here you are. Thank you too for your moral support.

name: THEOMACHIA
detailed_description:
From the moment the Helaphestian opened, you and your world were doomed. Spared from the initial invasion, now only you remain, the last inhabitant of the last city. All else has been consumed by the Helaphestian. Chosen by your people, and fueled by their sacrifice, you must do everything in your power to repel this attack and prevent your world from annihilation.

Features:


Fight off vast swarms of enemies with your psychokinetic powers!
In THEOMACHIA, the environment is your weapon, and you are given a variety of psychokinetic abilities that let you leverage the environment to your advantage. Push enemies away with a powerful psychic wave, or launch nearby objects at them using your telekinesis!

Fight for your life in a randomly generated city.
Every time you start a game, the layout of the city is randomized, making each run a unique experience. Explore the desolate city and its three distinct districts as you fight for your life and your world.

Upgrade your psychokinetic powers with dozens of abilities!
Obtain and upgrade dozens of psychokinetic powers to create a unique build that suits your playstyle. Your abilities can allow you to glide quickly through the city, take control of the environment and your enemies, or defend yourself against the scores of enemies.

  • Flee the storm as it devours your world.
  • Compete for the highest score on the global leaderboard.
  • Survive to get stronger: each wave you survive gives you points to upgrade your abilities.
  • Face off against over 20 distinct and dangerous enemies.
  • Discover the secrets of this abandoned world, and your own past.
  • Traverse the world with smooth movement abilities; dash through the air, cling to buildings, and glide above the city as you run from the storm.
  • Fight four deadly bosses as you fend off the transdimensional invaders.

short_description: THEOMACHIA is a permadeath action game in which you take on increasingly difficult waves of enemies using psychokinetic abilities. The environment is your only weapon. Use it to fight off dangerous enemies - beings from another dimension sent to conquer yours.

name: Potions!
detailed_description:
Potions! is an ingredient juggling, potion slinging, 2D, pixel-art shop management game

Brew and sell potions to customers during the day - prep during the night.
Drink potions to survive your enemies and the harsh elements.
Unlock spells to help serve the ever increasing demand.
And move on to the next town in search of new ingredients, recipes and spells.
Before your time runs out...

Features

  • Buy ingredients and combine them to make potions for your customers! Travel to new regions to unlock new ingredients and recipes, learn them by heart or refer to your Recipe Book to keep your customers happy.

  • Brave foul enemies and the dangerous climates of the realm! Drinking your potions will protect your livelihood just as much as selling them will!

  • Unlock spells and use your magic to make potions and defeat your enemies! Your spells will aid you in your quest to deliver your potions on time.

  • Procedural colour mixing and physic fun! Combine ingredients to make colourful concoctions, while physics interactions will either aid you or turn your shop to chaos!

  • Endless unique customers! Serve a variety of procedurally generated customers from different races, as you make your way across the land.

  • Froggin will keep you company! Your enchanted frog will soothe you with local melodies.

name: Save the Reactor
detailed_description:
"Have fun" as a rookie working at the nuclear reactor. Every day the tasks become more and more difficult, work becomes more and more stressful, and the chair under you burns hotter and hotter.



This small hardcore point-and-click simulator can your improve multitasking and stress resistance to the maximum level.


Over 50 different panels with an original way of interaction (who said it would be easy?).


Over 10 modifiers to make the game more complex if you find it too easy.

name: Verne: The Shape of Fantasy Demo
detailed_description:
A THRILLING STORY
The war against the dreadful Nation is devastating the world of Hemera. Aboard the mighty Nautilus, Jules Verne, Captain Nemo and his courageous crew struggle, chased by a relentless enemy, to get hold of a mysterious formidable energy, capable of changing the course of history: the Flame of Hephaestus, source of the power of Atlantis and also, of her fateful destruction.

In his journey, Verne will not only discover wonders and mysteries, but also face a dark and powerful force that is trying to eradicate imagination across Hemera… and inside his own mind.



GAMEPLAY
  • Discover and master the IMAG, an Atlantean ancient device that allows to rewrite the story and change Verne’s fate on certain moments.
  • Non-linear dialogues with a cast of exciting characters, performed by great actors.
  • Gameplay inspired by old school adventure games, based on exploration, platforms, puzzle-solving and interactive dialogues.
  • A steampunk unexplored world, brought to life with a very detailed pixel art that offers a wide range of sceneries: from the Nautilus’ dark corridors to ancient Atlantean ruins.
  • A thrilling story that reflects the ability of the human being to imagine and tell stories.
  • Easy-to-follow and attractive information about Jules Verne’s life and works.

name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Valor And Villainy Music Pack
detailed_description:
Stir epic emotions with these ten tracks of orchestral fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Powerful themes for valiant heroes and evil antagonists are accompanied by evocative music for their journeys and battles. Let these powerful tracks take you to another time when the sword was mightier than... other things that were not swords.

Features:

* 10 BGM tracks covering battle, dungeon, field, themes, and towns!
* .ogg and .m4a formats included.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

name: Start Programming
detailed_description:
百看不如一练

每个关卡都由三部分构成：


理论: 顾名思义，就是完成该关卡所需的理论知识；
练习: 验证所学知识，输入语句，即时得到反馈结果；
实战: 运用所学知识，输入代码，控制游戏完成关卡任务；

理论与实践紧密衔接，帮助您更好地理解编程知识、掌握编程技能。


从玩游戏到做游戏

教学过程可分为三个阶段：

基础入门阶段：介绍编程概念，了解代码的构成要素、语法结构，掌握一些基本工具的使用方法。


应用进阶阶段：通过实际案例，了解如何组织代码，学习简单的算法应用，掌握解决实际问题的思路与方法。


自由发挥阶段：发挥创意，自由编写游戏内容，还能将您的代码分享给其他小伙伴。

从基础要素到系统应用，循序渐进，降低入门难度。


专为初学者设计

教学内容通俗易懂、简单实用，教学语言“python”是当前主流编程语言之一，虽然简单易学，功能却很强大，能很快学以致用。

name: Roma VR - Domus
detailed_description:
TRAVEL BACK IN TIME

In the year 79 A.D the great volcano Mt.Vesuvius buried the ancient Roman town of Pompeii in a cataclysmic eruption. Today the famous ruins of Pompeii and it's inhabitants lay still for the world to see, but the ancient Pompeiians would not recognize their home if the were to see it.

Travel back to the year 79 A.D before the eruption of Mt.Vesuvius and see the famous house of an ancient Roman banker before it was destroyed by the volcano. Experience the vibrant colors of ancient life and learn about the ancient home and it's unusual ways.




FEATURES

FULL IMMERSION
Walk through the halls of an ancient Roman building in immersive Virtual Reality, with realistic graphics, lighting and sound design.

GUIDED TOUR
Take a guided tour of the restored House of Iucundus, learn about how he lived and life in ancient Pompeii. This voice guided tour will take you all through the ancient Domus and explain how each space was used.

FREE ROAM
Explore the restored House of Iucundus on your own, discover and relive the beautiful restored Roman Domus in Virtual Reality.



EARLY ACCESS

This title is in early access and we appreciate patience and feedback while we work to finish this VR experience. Many more features and spaces in the house will open as we continue development and will be announced in turn.

name: One day after the snow and wind
detailed_description:
关于本作

这是一个简单到只有十分钟流程的微型视觉小说。
故事发生平行宇宙中的未来世界。在经过了几场全球性瘟疫与核战争之后，地球上的人口数量急剧下降。幸存的人类自发地建立社区，以一种近似于原始社会的方式生存着。
在某个风雪过后的清晨，从熟睡中醒来的卡琳达睁开眼睛，她发现她的枕边人正在微笑地看着她……
“早上好。”

关于操作

鼠标右键——返回
鼠标左键\回车键——读取下一行
长按回车键——快进

name: Arboreal
detailed_description:
Lialis is a legless lizard wanting to climb up a giant tree. Will you help them reach the top?

Arboreal is a 2D platformer where you continuously evolve and gain new abilities in order to explore its world. Jump, climb, and explore the tree while talking with its inhabitants to learn more about the Great Tree and your own goals! Find and collect the tree's scattered Golden Leaves! Outpace Lialis's rivals in fast-paced platforming challenges as you continue exploring! Get different endings depending on what choices you make with your abilities throughout your journey! And maybe... get a fancy hat?

Game Features:
- 4 Evolutions
- A connected world of 15+ rooms
- 15 Collectable Golden Leaves
- 22 Achievements
- 5 Different Endings

detailed_description:
The game "蔚蓝月下" is a role-playing plot love game. In the game, will players play a leading role and three cute heroines to start a very interesting love story.

1. Map Function

Click the mobile phone-dot map to open the map function, which is used to trigger various types of theaters in the scene. The map contains various scenes such as schools, playgrounds, parks, etc. According to the player's choice and plot development, in different locations The heroines meet, date, and gradually establish relationships.

2.sms Function

Click on the mobile phone-SMS to enter the page. According to the storyline development of the main line and dating, it will trigger the SMS interaction with the four heroines, Yichi and others. Eventually change the direction and ending of the game ~

3. Action Mode

A small gameplay that only appears in the middle of a story dialogue (emmmmm ... is a small surprise, although it borrows some audio game elements from the market, but we hope to combine it with galgame to bring a different story experience) According to the completion level of the small gameplay, it will have a certain impact on the trend of the player's plot ~

4. Multiple Endings

With the reincarnation of fate, will it finally be a beautiful love story? Or gradually discover the truth of the world? Or is it any other ending?

name: Minecart Madness
detailed_description:
Minecart Madness is a 2D arcade infinite-runner in the style of early platforming games. Take on the role of an ape in a minecart and ride the rails as far as you can while dodging inbound minecarts and leaping over gaps in the track.

The game features a variety of game modes, each introducing new challenges and gameplay opportunities:

  • Classic - standard, balanced gameplay
  • Superflat - like classic, but all track segments generate at the same vertical height
  • Low gravity - enables longer air time at the expense of jump accuracy
  • Too much brake - near-limitless braking ability
  • Ultra mega - enemy carts spawn more frequently and move faster
  • Late start - start with more points and gain an initial speed-boost
  • Crocodile craze - holes don't spawn, and enemies spawn more frequently
  • No holes barred - enemies don't spawn, and holes spawn more frequently

All game modes can also be played with two players on the same system in split-screen multiplayer.

Minecart Madness supports keyboard and controller input modes for one or two players.

Controls
Gamepad inputs use default SDL_Joystick mappings which means there is no standard scheme for controllers. If you are serious about using a controller, I would recommend using the steam controller mapping I created for the game, or your own custom scheme.

Player 1:
  • C - Confirm/Jump
  • X - Back/Brake

Player 2:
  • . - Confirm/Jump
  • , - Back/Brake

General:
  • ARROWS - Menu navigation
  • F - FPS display toggle
  • G - Fullscreen
  • SPACE - Pause

name: Slashers
detailed_description:
Add to wishlist


Join Our Discord


About the Game

Features

  • 1-4 players
    Put yourself in the shoes of one of the 4 friends.
  • Voice Chat
    Talk to your friends through voice chat, but be careful, he can hear you.
  • Difficulties
    Play in various difficulties (Easy, Normal, Difficult, Nightmare)
  • Modalities
    Play in various modes (Classic,Slashers,Madness,Spin) [Developing gradually]
  • Enemy
    Various phases of the enemy depending on its weakness and difficulty.
  • Objects, Shops and Posters
    All objects, shops and posters change in each new game completely.

Gameplay

Classic Mode
  • Objects
    All the collectibles are randomly found around the map, some more important ones like batteries to illuminate your flashlight, lockpick to get players out of cells, bat to hit the enemy with it, gasoline to turn on the generator since some doors/machines require electricity.
  • Fragments
    You must get all the fragments, these can become a puzzle, some objects will be required to place them, finally you will need to incorporate a burned mask to a totem, for this you must find each mask and each object that requires each machine / area.
  • Lockpick
    The enemy will try to prevent you from getting the masks at all costs so he will try to lock you in cells and then do rituals with you, for this it is important that each member has a lockpick.
  • Sound
    Play with sounds, anything you use will attract the attention of the enemy, that means that activating certain machines, generator, totems and in addition to running, talking will also attract him.
  • Vision
    The enemy has difficulty seeing in the dark, but as fragments are burned, he will become more and more aggressive, he grows, changes his appearance and becomes faster, you must be careful with the flashlight, he can see you from far away with the flashlight on, being very fast you will not be able to flee from him, so you must play in the shadows with his vision.
  • Save resources
    If the enemy has captured one of the members, with a bat you can knock down the enemy and stop grabbing your partner, this will save you a lockpick.

Replayability

The game is designed to be replayed infinite times, so each tent, objects, posters, will appear randomly or will be generated randomly.

You will also unlock difficulties as you continue playing, this will increase the number of fragments you must get and the enemy will reach new phases.

Welcome to the circus!


The circus is a recently abandoned place, a group of friends sneak in to see how everything is, what will happen next was not foreseeable.

Lost and found


Random objects around the map you will have to find, you will need to fit it with other pieces to weaken the enemy.

Map


Objects, posters and markets change with each new game.

Run away or Fight


You can try to escape from the enemy or fight against him, there are various objects on the map with which you can hit the enemy and stun him, this can come in handy to save friends.

Avoid being caught


If you are caught they will lock you in areas where your friends can rescue you, you will not be able to get out of there unless they rescue you, if you are all trapped, you will move on to another unwanted form.

Advances and web

All the news, updates, photos and videos of the community are available through the web, where you can also see the progress to make the next update.

We require your support in positive reviews to proceed to update!

name: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning
detailed_description:
Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning is a little, but fun 2D platformer where you play as a red blob fighting through the different levels in each of the 4 different seasons to save the season from the enemies you will encounter. (Although this is not said in the main game).

Each season presents itself with its own challenge.

Summer:
In Summer you will be faced with incredible heat to knock your spirit down.

Autumn:
In Autumn the leaves will blow in your face and you must be careful to not be blinded by them.

Winter:
In Winter you will have to tread through the harsh and cold snow.

Spring:
In Spring you will be surrounded by a lovely breeze but don't get too comfortable remember you still need to save the seasons!

In the game, there are two different enemies that will stop you on your trail.

The blocks and the maces. The blocks are square entities with spikes around them and angry eyes, while the maces are just maces that spin around in a circle. You will need to face both enemies in order to complete the level.

In order to move to the next level you will need to get to the chest at the end of the level but be careful because some levels will take you off the path and mislead you with a fake chest.

You will also find checkpoints around the level so when you die you will respawn at that checkpoint.

Happy traveling Red Adventurers! Enjoy the journey.

name: Gilded Shadows
detailed_description:
Description

Gilded Shadows is a GxB visual novel that explores a whimsical, yet dangerous world which blends the solarpunk and cyberpunk aesthetics into a unique adventure. The player can explore different factions and story lines based on their choices in the common route. The game has 30-40 hours of content where your personality traits lock or unlock various interactions and responses to situations. As you follow the MC on her journey, pursue one of six love interests in a stand-alone story unique to that route.


Story

Arcalis is a planet with a complex history.

Centuries ago, when humans arrived, they found it abandoned. The only remnants of its previous society were massive bio-domes dotted on the surface and designed as protection from the hostile climate.

With one side of the world bathed in eternal day and the other cloaked in frigid night, the bio-domes are oases where people live sheltered from the scorching winds and storms. But whether in the bright, clean cities of the day side of the planet, or the poor and crime-ridden cities of the night side, life is never simple nor peace easy to come by.

When a fateful encounter exposes Morgan Leone, a young woman who has long hid her ESP, as a queen ranked Esper, she finds herself on the run from multiple factions eager to attain her abilities. Endgame, the planetary defence organisation; Crimson, a notorious crime syndicate from Delphine; and even the shadowy group only known as "the Host" - each group sends operatives to retrieve her.

Now, with several paths open to her, she must choose her allies carefully. Between light and shadow lies grey twilight where the lines between good and evil are blurred. And in a world where the only constants are the endless day and night that divide the planet, Morgan learns those who can't adapt...also can't survive.


Features (in finished game)

6 love interests to pursue in initial release
9 Love interests to pursue (to be released)
Customise the MC's appearance and personality
100,000+ words per route with at least 3 endings each
Stand-alone character routes with unique plots
Expansive and gorgeous setting, world, and lore
Flowcharts to track progress through the story

content_descriptors.notes:
Gilded Shadows contains fantasy and science fiction violence including fight sequences and descriptions of characters being attacked. There are visual depictions of mild injuries and some blood but no extreme gore.

The game contains harsh language and profanity. There are also depictions of trauma and mental health issues.

The game contains some sexual situations and innuendo as well as non-graphic love scenes that can be toggled off in the settings screen. There are visual depictions of kissing and characters in undergarments but no depictions of nudity aside from male shirtlessness.

name: Facteroids Demo
detailed_description:
Facteroids is a factory building game about mining in deep space. Land with your spaceship on a barren piece of rock in space. Deploy automated bots and start building your mining empire. You will explore and prospect asteroids. Extract resources and process them in a complex factory production lines of your design.

Demo version.

In the demo you will play through tutorial missions, build your colony in a sandbox game and explore a large mining installation on a showcase map.

Manage resources and energy.

Machines in factories are always hungry for materials and power. Build conveyor belts, pipes and power lines to secure steady supply of resources.

Take advantage of fully destructible 3D environment

Every asteroid body is a 3D object. The 3rd dimension adds another level of complexity to your factory designs. Asteroid mass can be removed or deployed as needed. If a mine gets depleted it leaves a hole in the ground.

name: A Tale About Flowers
detailed_description:
A Tale About flowers is a short Visual Novel located in a cyberpunk city where you play as Canaan, a young investigator. As you investigate a murder you uncover some secrets you shouldn't have. What will be your fate ? Follow the story by clicking through the dialogues of the different characters and make important choices to get one of the 5 endings. You may want to live the optional romance available.

The Game Features


  • English and French localization,

  • 30 minutes of gameplay per run,

  • 5 endings,

  • Two special illustration to illustrate important events,

  • A lot of important choices which affect your story,

  • A cast of interesting characters.

  • An optional romance

  • Point & click parts.

/!\ There is no save system in the game, make sure to have enough time to play.

name: Narru: the Forgotten Lands
detailed_description:
Narru: the Forgotten Lands is a story-driven puzzle game based on satisfying exploration. Become a piece of light that's mission is to wander around the island once inhabited by a mysterious civilization and discover a story of its disappearance. Search the ruins to enter a memories dimension and discover the story of people who are no more.

The greatest secrets are always hidden and protected. Learn how to solve ancient puzzles and find valuable knowledge.



Wander around the island and discover all of its secrets, hidden passages, altars, paintings. and ruins that carry the story of the ancients. Listen to the voice of a goddess that will help you understand what happened.





Watch the world come back to life wherever you go. Fill the land and ruins with your light and let everything around you bloom.





Solve puzzles to activate ancient mechanisms and reveal secrets of the ones who used to live on the island. Look for the hints painted on ruins and you will never get lost.





Learn and master new abilities to visit previously inaccessible places and solve complex puzzles. Water walking, wall climbing, and more will help you reach new secrets as you explore the island.





Search ancient ruins, find altars, learn new skills, collect memories, and find keys to unlock new story fragments and discover what happened to the civilization that once inhabited the island.

name: Labyrinth deLux - A Crusoe Quest
detailed_description:
Welcome to the Labyrinth, Space Trucker!
In this VR puzzle game you take on the role of Robin, the Space Trucker, who is pulled through a wormhole into the adventure of a lifetime.
You wake up in a temple-like environment and have to traverse and decipher a 16 different rooms campaign.

Your task is to direct a laser beam through the twisting rooms by using rotatable mirrors, wall mirrors and prisms, uniting different colored lasers and hitting specific targets to open the gates to the next room.

You'll be able to teleport to the ceiling and walls of the rooms, walk all around, grab and align the mirrors and lasers to direct the laser beam past obstacles and hit the right targets.

You'll be accompanied by your artificial assistant Friday, who will always be at your side. With his help and your scan function, you'll be able to decipher the stone pillars and learn more about the ancient civilization that built this labyrinth and why they built it.

Embedded in a funny, yet mysterious story, you'll have to solve the mystery of an ancient civilization and get closer to the mysterious treasure with each room you solve.

Are you the chosen one who can solve all the rooms and reveal the secret of the treasure?

《Story》


Long, long ago, there was a fox girl named Komachi who married a human.
However, the lifespan of humans is far shorter than her own, and Komachi was left widowed.
She spent several hundred years filled with regret: "If it was to end in such tragedy, I should never have gotten involved with humans."
Now living quietly at a shrine in a secluded mountain village, Komachi finds herself helping "Jin," an injured boy lost in the mountains.

Ten years later… Jin has grown into an adult, having completely forgotten that incident.
One day, a voluptuous woman with fox ears who exudes sex appeal turns up in front of him.

"Um… Who would you be…?"
"Even though I just saved your life…
Hah, you've completely forgotten me. What a sad reality this is."
"Uh, so… do you have some sort of business with me?"
"Oho, I do indeed. You humans grow up so fast… I thought it would be about time for a feast♪"

Then, the woman takes a still uncomprehending Jin by the hands,
enters his room, and pushes him down on the bed…

name: Right Nice Party
detailed_description:
Join the conversation on Discord


Talk to the developers and other fans about Right Nice Party!


About the Game

FEATURES

  • Refreshing new take on the party board formula!
  • Fun and wacky Mini-Games that exercise all kinds of skills!
  • AI Players can fill the spots if you're not four players!
  • Right Nice Party is cross-platform compatible!


Get ready for a new kind of party! One with a colorful world, cheerful characters and a new take on the party game for the whole family. It's... Right Nice Party!

CONQUEST MODE

In the headlining game mode of Right Nice Party, four players move across the board as they use their points to take over Locations. If you own the most Locations by the end of the final round, you win! But be careful, other players can go to your Locations and spend more to take them for themselves! Additionally, crazy Items and fun Events can change things up when you least expect it! It's a refreshing new take on the classic party formula that is sure to engage you in strategic gameplay and unexpected outcomes.

MINI-GAMES!

Do you want Mini-Games? Right Nice Party has them. After every round, players engage in a Mini-Game selected at random! Some exercise skill, some you're going to have to think about and some are just plain weird! Take the thrilling rush of Rapid Reader, where you must flip your schoolbook to the correct page faster than your classmates or the spoopy halls of Ghastly Grievance where one player has to control the terrifying Ghoul and try to eat all other players before the time runs out. With a variety of team setups and fun ideas, the Mini-Games in Right Nice Party are sure to surprise and delight players of all kinds.


Anyone can join the party! Right Nice Party is playable both locally with multiple controllers or online. In fact, you can even mix the two! Two people can play on the same device while the rest of your friends join in online. Last but not least, Right Nice Party is fully cross-platform and will be released on computers, consoles and mobile devices. With a wide variety of options, you and your friends are sure to find a setup that works for you.
